title: vaDivazhaguDaiyOnai
sahitya:
vaDivazhaguDaiyOnai vAn pugazh uDaiyOnai vaDa pazhaniyil tozha vArum kaDaittEra


anupallavi

  aDi tozhum aDiyArai iDar uraviDAmal tan kaDaikkaN aruLAl gati pera krpai kUrum


caraNam    koDiya tol vinaiyAl kollum mana vEdanaiyAl uDaiyAdu uLLattai urudi uLLadAkki
paDi mIdu bhaktar paDum pADellAm pOkki paramAnandam UTTi karuNai kATTiDuvOn
